caseTitle: Federation of Pakistan through Chairman FBR, Islamabad & others v. Zahid Malik
tagline: Effect of Departmental Inquiry in violation of E&D Rules. Powers of inquiry officer. Role of departmental representative. Article 10A of the Constitution. Vested right of cross examination under the E&D Rules. The Inquiry officer should be conversant with the applicable rules before conducting inquiry. The remand of matter cannot be claimed to rectify the lacunas or violation of rules in the inquiry proceedings by the inquiry officer.
